subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Costel Pantilimon gave a gift to Blackburn as 10-man Manchester City was held to a 1-1 draw in the third round of the F.A. Cup on Saturday.
snippet: Goalkeeper Costel Pantilimon gave a gift to Blackburn as 10-man Manchester City was held to a 1-1 draw in the third round of the F.A. Cup on Saturday.
